title: Machine Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: English Learning Strategies for Chinese Professionals Studying Abroad

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English proficiency and overseas living experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more factors hindering their English learning by analyzing their home environment.
Learners can establish an English learning implementation plan utilizing a family support system
Learners can develop English learning strategies that balance cultural values and personal needs
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
